An example post with screenshots

Posted on 31 December 2019 • Tags: examples

This is an example of a standard design history post – it begins with a preamble about the design and ends with a list of screenshots.

Some real examples are:

  • Apply for teacher training: Reasons for withdrawing an application
  • Manage teacher applications: Deferring an application
  • Find postgraduate teacher training: A snapshot of the service

This page was generated

After screenshots were saved to the app/images/example-post directory, this page was generated using the following command:

node scripts/generate.js example-post

Read the guide on how to use this script

You can print this page

If you print preview a design history post you’ll see that each screenshot is given its own page.
